name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IP Whois & Flags Chrome & Websites Rating

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display Website Country Flag. Website Whois - how many Visitors are visiting, Reputation Reviews, Antivirus Check, Alexa, Incognito

long.ar,de,es,fa,fr,hi,it,pl,ru,th,uk,zh_CN,z:
Full Information on Any Website -
- Display Country Flag indicating Website Physical Location
- Website Popularity (Live Visitor Statistics). Shows how many users are visiting any World Website per day
- Website IPv4 Address
- Website IPv6 Address
- Website Location 
(Country with Flag, State, City)
- Host Name
- DNS Information
- Nameservers
- Whois Owner Information
- Hosting Company
- Website Server/Hosting Visual Diagram
- Other Sites on this IP Address
- IP Whois Lookup
-  Real-time visits analysis and Internet traffic stats 
- Check you are visiting Websites for Viruses/Malware on Symantec Website (Norton Antivirus Safe Web SiteAdviser)
- Website Popular Rating (Live Alexa Rank)

======== FIREFOX EXTENSION ==========

Our Extension for Firefox here -
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/flags-for-firefox-websites-/

=====================================

- Supported registrars: GoDaddy, NetworkSolutions, Moniker, Dotster, 1and1, NameCheap, Register, Yahoo, HeartInternet, 123-Reg, FatCow, NetFirms, Daily, Flagg, Name, Enom, FastHosts, Registro.br and more domain registrators

- Quick share button: Share your/other users website comments to Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Pinterest, Wordpress, Blogger, Digg, Vkontakte, Odnoklassniki, LiveJournal and many more.

long.am,bg,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4:
Full Information on Any Website -
- Display Country Flag indicating Website Physical Location
- Website Owners Whois
- Website Popularity (Live Visitor Statistics). Shows how many users are visiting any World Website per day
- Website IPv4/IPv6 Address
- Hosting Company
- DNS Information
- Other Sites on this IP Address

Also
========
- Check you are visiting Websites for Viruses/Malware on Symantec Website (Norton Antivirus Safe Web SiteAdviser)
- Alexa Popularity Rank
- Web of Trust (MyWOT) Rank
- Ignore X-Frame headers - Drops X-Frame-Options HTTP response headers, allowing all pages to be iframed.
- Website Reputation Reviews
- New incognito window: Provides a quick access to the secure incognito mode for current page

======== FIREFOX EXTENSION ==========

Our Extension for Firefox here -
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/flags-for-firefox-websites-/

=====================================
long.bn,cs,id,ja,nl,ro,sv,tr,vi:
1) Display a country flag indicating the physical location of the websites you are visiting. 

2) One click check you are visiting Websites for Viruses/Malware on Symantec Website (Norton Antivirus Safe Web SiteAdviser). 

3) Display Hosting Company On Any Website / Owner on Any IP Address.

4) One click Website Reviews

5) Website Nameservers (usually provided by hosting company)

6) Other websites on this IP Now/Before, Owner Lookup, etc

long.ms:
1) With one click you can add new comments/reviews and can read other user reviews about any webpages of ANY websites.  We have included reviews/comments about your current browsing site and your current page (and any products, articles that are being published on this current page) in our flag button popup window (simply click the flag button).

2) Display a country flag indicating the physical location of the websites you are visiting. 

3) With One click you can check you are visiting Websites for Viruses/Malware on Symantec Website (Norton Antivirus Safe Web SiteAdviser). 

4) One click to share current browsing page to Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Pinterest, Wordpress, Blogger, Digg, LiveJournal, Skype, Messenger, Vkontakte, Yahoo, Google, Bing, Baidu, Email, 7live7, A1-webmarks, Add to BX, Adfty, Allvoices, Amazon Wish List, Arto, Baidu, Bebo, Blinklist, Blip, Blogged, Blogger, Blogmarks, Brainify, BuddyMarks, Care2, chiq, CiteULike, Connotea, Corank, Corkboard, Current, Dealspl.us, Delicious, Digg, Diigo, Dotnetshoutout, Dzone, Edmodo, Email, Evernote, Facebook, Facebook Like, Facebook Recommend, Facebook Send, Facebook Subscribe, Fark, fashiolista, Folkd, Formspring, Foursquare Follow, Foursquare Save, Fresqui, FriendFeed, Funp, fwisp, Google Bookmarks, Google Reader, Google Translate, Google +, Google +1, Hadash Hot, Hatena, Hyves, Identi, Instagram Badge, Instapaper, jumptags, Kaboodle, Linkagogo, LinkedIn, LiveJournal, mail.ru, Meneame, Messenger, Mixx, Mr Wong, Myspace, N4g, Netlog, Netvouz, Newsvine, Nujij, Odnoklassniki, Oknotizie, Orkut, Qrcode, Pinterest, Pinterest Follow, Plaxo, Raise Your Voice, Reddit, Segnalo, Sina, Slashdot, Sonico, Speedtile, Squidoo, StartAid, Startlap, Strands, StumbleUpon, Stumpedia, Technorati, Tumblr, Twackle, Twitter, Twitter Follow, TypePad, Viadeo, Vkontakte, Virb, Voxopolis, Wordpress, Xanga, Xerpi, xing, YouTube, Y! Bookmarks, Yahoo Pulse, Yammer, Yigg, moShare and many more.

5) Display Hosting Company On Any Website / Owner on Any IP Address, Other websites on this IP Now/Before, Security, SEO Web, Alexa Traffic Rank, DNS, Reverse IP,  Live Whois Lookup, etc.
Quick access to developer tools - Microsoft Windows, Apple Iphone, Ipad, Android 4, PHP, MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Java, Javascript, Jquery, Ajax scripts, C++, Adobe Flash Player, Ruby on Rails, XML, ASP, CFML, HTML5, CGI, Perl library, Python, etc.
